channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘NYT Mini’ Clues And Answers For Saturday, November 1
item.description: Looking for help with today's NYT Mini Crossword puzzle? Here are some hints and answers for the puzzle.

item.title: Government Seeks Private Backers To Deploy AI To Protect Electric Grid
item.description: Government researchers are seeking to commercialize a unique use of AI to detect cyber attacks and physical problems with the electrical grid.

item.title: AI Chips For The Future
item.description: AI transformation depends on specialized chip innovation—power, cooling, cost, and design speed drive the next hardware era.
